评论概述: This dress is perfect for first-timers for lolita fashion
评论详情: Black goes with anything so you can build a very cute outfit with this dress!

the strings on the side help cinch the dress in a very nice way, I wasn’t for sure if I should follow the sizing guide so I just chose a size that i thought would fit but oh well. Overall very nice dress for a gothic lolita look!
Really low quality. Not suited for Japanese Street Fashion,EGL, Goth. It's basically Halloween quality. Do NOT buy!! Just don't!
I like this a lot. Generally, I order a size XXL in clothes. I should have ordered an XL size. No real complaints. I love the dress but wish I new ahead of time to order a size smaller.

I was super impressed with the quality of this dress. I bought it for my daughter’s Misa cosplay. It looks so cute on her and fits perfect! I followed the size chart and got her a medium. For reference, she wears a woman’s size 6.

The dress fits perfectly for me and I got a medium, the top is not too revealing and its adjustable with the laces on the side (if u want to make the waist a little tighter) It doesn't really need a petticoat since its already naturally poofy, but I wouldn't mind getting one anyway. The zipper is also nice on the side. And its perfect length for the skirt. The laces on the side are a bit long but nothing a lil cutting and burning can't fix ;B  My only complaint is: there is NOT any pockets. Purses are useful to go with this dress ;D  -♡☆
This dress not only fits great but looks super cute. I would buy again if I need another one.
I sized up and it fit perfectly I am a XL for reference I got a 1x

This is my first time dressing in this sort of way (Lolita) so I went with this dress, because I was on the cheaper end and if it turns out I didn’t like wearing this style it was still a good dress to wear if I needed a  dress I just wouldn’t wear a petticoat under it or a corset. The material is good for what you paid for and it beginner friendly. I was slightly big on me on my top half but still looked good.

评论概述: Very nice dress, runs a little big in size
评论详情: I ordered the XL first but it was too big so I ordered it again in size L and that was a better fit. The ribbons on either side of the waist can be tighted similar to a corset to create a tighter fit at the waist. This dress is very comfortable. I tried it with a petticoat, but it actually looks better on its own without a petticoat. I only wish that it came with pockets. For reference, I am 5'3" and 187 lbs. My waist measures 35.5 inches around.

评论概述: Size chart is a little weird but the product is nice
评论详情: According to the size chart I would have been between a medium and a large. I took a gamble and decided to size down. The medium actually ended up being pretty big on me to the point where I could get the dress on and off without undoing the zipper. Which is good because the zipper was honestly a pain.  The dress is cute but it definitely needed a hoopskirt to go underneath it and give it a nice puffy effect like how it's shown on the listing. Looks okay without a petticoat too, I just prefer the silhouette shape to be wider.  The only other thing I don't like is the cheap looking lace-up ribbons on the side. I don't know if the ribbons are meant to actually serve a purpose, like to tighten the dress or if it's just there to be decorative. But they look cheap and they don't really stay tied all that well.
Sizing by chart seems accurate. Teen was happy to have a valentines dance that matches their look. Honestly it’s so cute I might borrow it. Wear with a colorful petticoat for filler fun look
It’s good for the price but the bows on the sides keep getting undone.
Doesn’t stretch but it for my daughter beautifully…

My daughter bought this for homecoming. She loves Lolita dresses. She added some accessories to make it a little more steampunk, but fit her great. It’s very pretty and had a good bit of fluff, but would need more petticoat underneath to get the fullness most would want.
Super cute and great value
Fits well. I will add more stars when i get to wear it but i have not worn it except to try it on yet. Well made and very cute with my maty janes or goth boots
It is such a cute everyday wear dress; very flattering and well made. It fit perfectly. I wish it came in other colors, like army green, red, beige, white. *Hint hint*
I’m just so happy that I found a jsk on amazon that actually fits me and looks just as pictured. Its actually kind of too big! Wish it came in more colors though, like light blue or light pink.
Beautiful! Great packaging! True to size!  Perfect dress. Well made. Very true to picture. Don’t think twice—get it!
